name: Train Escape: Detective Story
description:
Are you ready to go on a thrilling journey and deal with unsolved mystery?
Become a true detective and help to find the murderer!

With the main character you embark on exciting adventure through England in one of the most respectable trains, where you become involuntary participant in a scandalous incident - a murder of the passenger.
You play the game in a the role of Louis White - a famous writer of detectives. Together with former police chief Harry Morgan and family doctor Roy Fisher, you have to find out what connects the people on the train. What secrets do they keep from each other? Who is a liar, and who is only a victim of circumstances? The answers are waiting for you in the end of this story!

Features:
- incredible detective story;
- fascinating puzzles and hidden caches;
- excellent graphics;
- thematic musical accompaniment.

Follow Mr. White in search of evidence, interview passengers and learn more and more details about the mysterious incident. Can you unravel the tangle of complex intricacies and find out the truth?
